TheParasitized:pi_callOfSwarm_power.NAME: 大群之唤
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，升级所有手牌；你的手牌没有上限

TheParasitized:pi_growth_power.NAME: 野蛮生长
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗结束时，恢复生命值

TheParasitized:pi_sacrifice_power.NAME: 牺牲
DESCRIPTIONS: 你可以打出诅咒牌，打出诅咒牌时，抽牌

TheParasitized:pi_wither_power.NAME: 凋零
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束时，失去生命值，使buff来源恢复同等生命值

TheParasitized:pi_nesting_power.NAME: 筑巢
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束时，将 张生长加入手牌

TheParasitized:pi_pumping_power.NAME: 竭泽
DESCRIPTIONS: 打出 张牌后，结束当前回合

TheParasitized:pi_graspingAtCurses_power.NAME: 饮鸩止渴
DESCRIPTIONS: 打出 张牌后，结束当前回合

TheParasitized:pi_thornyFlesh_power.NAME: 蛰刺皮肤
DESCRIPTIONS: 被攻击时，给予攻击者 层虚弱，层中毒

TheParasitized:pi_cognitiveFilter_power.NAME: 认知滤网
DESCRIPTIONS: 当你获得负面状态时，获得 格挡

TheParasitized:pi_witherEnchantment_powe.NAME: 凋零附魔
DESCRIPTIONS: 造成伤害时，额外给予 层凋零
